TABLE_INFORMATION: Use this information to query the wegovnyc_citywide_payroll table.
table_description: Contains raw payroll data for NYC agencies.

table_columns.name: agency_start_date
table_columns.description: Date the employee started working for the agency.

table_columns.name: fiscal_year
table_columns.description: Fiscal year of the payroll data.

table_columns.name: leave_status_as_of_june_30
table_columns.description: Leave status of the employee as of June 30.

table_columns.name: ot_hours
table_columns.description: Overtime hours worked by the employee.
